rows.label: qst200601_msg0002
rows.name: What's wrong? Kubira.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0004
rows.name: Kubira?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0005
rows.name: Do not speak so lightly to your king.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0006
rows.name: I was in the midst of deep thought.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0007
rows.name: Sorry... But you looked a bit down.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0008
rows.name:
Hmph, very well. To be
concerned for your king is
a fine display of loyalty.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0009
rows.name:
In light of that, I shall overlook
your previous transgression.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0010
rows.name:
You see, I was once
the king of a nation.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0011
rows.name:
My kingdom? My people? What
has become of them now?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0012
rows.name:
I constantly ask myself
these questions.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0013
rows.name:
But alas, I have no
memory of my kingdom.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0014
rows.name:
Therefore, I have no way of knowing
the current state of my kingdom...

rows.label: qst200601_msg0015
rows.name:
And now, as a mere Blade,
I serve a lowly Driver.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0016
rows.name:
Ah, what sorrow, that I, a
king, must be commanded...

rows.label: qst200601_msg0017
rows.name: Don't tell that to us.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0018
rows.name:
Well, that's just what it
means to be a Driver...

rows.label: qst200601_msg0020
rows.name:
I believe that even without
memories, there may still
be written records.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0021
rows.name: Of course! Meleph, you have a keen eye.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0022
rows.name:
For a kingdom ruled by
one as great as I,

rows.label: qst200601_msg0023
rows.name:
it is only natural to think
that it would be recorded
in some literature.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0024
rows.name:
Everyone! From this moment,
we shall search for items
recording my great deeds!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0025
rows.name: Do such things really exist?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0026
rows.name:
If they do exist, it would be
in old books or history texts.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0027
rows.name:
That's it! Zeke, your
loyalty is magnificent!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0028
rows.name: The objective is set!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0029
rows.name:
We shall visit bookstores in various
lands, acquire old books, and
investigate me and my kingdom!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0030
rows.name: Now, follow me!
